cards.name: stealing_potions
cards.desc: You were caught stealing polyjuice potion. Lose 10 House Points!

cards.name: catch_snitch
cards.desc: You caught the Golden Snitch and won the big match! Gain 15 House Points!

cards.name: caught_sneaking
cards.desc: You were caught sneaking around after hours. Lose 10 House Points!

cards.name: wingardium_leviosa
cards.desc: You said "Wingardium Leviosa" right on your first try! Gain 10 House Points

cards.name: go_to_jail
cards.desc: Uh oh! You told a lie! You're going to detention with Umbridge.

cards.name: get_out_of_jail
cards.desc: Professor Umbridge got kidnapped by Centaurs. Get out of detention!

cards.name: free_house_elf
cards.desc: You dropped a sock and it landed on a house elf. Gain 10 House Points!
